titleStmt.title: Annus tenebrosus, or The dark year Or astrologicall iudgements upon two lunar eclipses, and one admirable eclips of the sun, all visible in England, 1652. Together with a short method how to judge the effects of eclipses. / By William Lilly, student in astrologie.
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers, and H. Blunden at the Castle in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Catamite, and" inserted with a caret between 'Lilly,' and 'student'; "march 22 1651"; and the last number of the date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
